name: Spirit Guardians
description: You call forth spirits to protect you. They flit around you to a distance of 15 feet for the duration. You choose whether the spirits are angelic or demonic. When a creature enters the area for the first time on a turn or starts its turn there, it must make a Wisdom saving throw. It takes 3d8 radiant (good) or necrotic (evil) damage on a failed save.
